" Zahi Hawass was not yet a member of Mubarak's cabinet when Parker profiled him in 2009, but was already prone to statements of his influence. Parker writes that when he met Zahi Hawass , his dominant conversational tone was rebuttal laced with invective and self-regard, built on the premise-it has some merit-that the international standing of Egypt is powerfully connected to the standing of Zahi Hawass . He has no doubt that his fame is a vital national asset. And it's an asset likely to carry over even if the Mubarak government falls, Parker says. US state department spokesman Simon Cowell Crowley, speaking to reporters in Washington yesterday, too indicated that Cameron Munter had called on Asif Ali Zardari to release the arrested official. We continue to make clear to the government of Pakistan that our diplomat has diplomatic immunity; in our view,( he) was acting in self-defence and should be released... Ambassador Cameron Munter met... with President Asif Ali Zardari to continue to make that point, he said. Reports also suggested that this fresh irritant in bilateral relations could affect Asif Ali Zardari 's upcoming visit to Washington. We're happy the majority of workers at Mirafiori has understood Fiat's commitment to transform it into a plant with an international reach, Sergio Marchionne , 58, said in an e-mailed statement today.
